name: Katkoot
description:
HELLo

Hello, dear player, let me introduce my little fun, easy, and totally playable game. A game any 6-year-old will be able to beat in a minute. 100% family game that won't make you scream and hit the wall. You, and your cat, can enjoy this wonderful piece of totally nice errors and extremely obvious and straight-to-the-point hints that well-explains what's going on in a friendly manner. I guarantee that every secret item is just in the way that it can't be called a secret anymore. You will absolutely love it.

Tools

If you are interested, here is what I used to make this game: 

LÖVE :  A lovely *and free*  game framework.

Aseprite : A good pixel art tool. Seriously, I love it.

BFXR : A little handy tool to create random sound effects.

Don't forget to share a screenshot when you finish it :)

Thank You <3
